name: Gabrielle Kessler
education: Tisch School of the Arts, NYU, Drama (2001 - 2005)

experience.title: SVP Brand Experience & Production
experience.description: Senior leader overseeing agency production and delivery across content, partnerships and earned-led activations. Experiential SME.

experience.title: SVP Brand Experience
experience.description: Oversees all B2C integrated program solutions and revenue opportunities for Future PLC, the global media company specializing in the Tech, Gaming, Music, and Knowledge verticals.

experience.title: VP Client Solutions
experience.description: Oversees all B2C integrated program solutions and revenue opportunities for Future PLC, the global media company specializing in the Tech, Gaming, Music, and Knowledge verticals.

experience.title: Head of Strategy, Partnerships & Revenue
experience.description: Primetime Emmy-nominated content-driven media company focusing on digital, viral videos and personalities. Managed branded content activations with Fortune 500 brands and coordinated social good and charitable programs.

experience.title: Head of Integrated Marketing & Director Brand Partnerships
experience.description: Built IM department from the ground-up at the fastest growing independent MCN. Oversaw creative ideation, process, and execution of brand integration campaigns across multiple content verticals including lifestyle, entertainment, gaming, and music.

experience.title: Director of Business Development
experience.description: Led development of new business and maintained key agency relationships. Contributed to the development and refinement of the company's vision and strategy.

experience.title: Senior Accounts Manager
experience.description: Managed multiple client accounts, maintained client relationships from pitch to delivery, developed high-level digital strategies, and oversaw social community management teams.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Managed projects for a start-up video marketing agency, established online presence for clients through video production, distribution, social media, and SEO/VSEO marketing. Handled business development, strategy, production responsibilities, budgets, and timelines.

experience.title: Marketing
experience.description: Acted as liaison between Art Directors and contract artists in Advertising, Commercial Production, and Feature Film Production. Managed internal brand marketing, created visual marketing materials, edited video reels, managed website operations and SEO marketing, and expanded the artist roster.

experience.title: Owner/Operator
experience.description: Provided commercial photography, graphic design, logo and branding services for clients including musicians, actors, independent film production companies, high-end interior designers, and restaurateurs.

bio: Well-rounded marketing professional with 10+ years creating innovative solutions for clients across multiple verticals.
